entry.title: Editor - document #38: Distributed Resource Management Application API Version 2 (DRMAA) - Errata
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to AD review
  • Assignee set to Wolfgang Ziegler

Disclosure: I have been involved in updating that specification, but am not a co-author.

Hi Wolfgang, here is another DRMAA document to review for you. It should go to 'initial GFSG review' state once your are done.

In my opinion, the changes are sufficiently minor, and the DRMAA spec is sufficiently new, to warrant an errata update (i.e. no new public comments and GFD number). Also, this is the language independent spec, so no implementations exist, by definition. The only existing language rendering is the submitted C-binding, which is in sync with this updated spec version, and in fact triggered most of the changes.

Thanks, Andre.

entry.title: Editor - document #38: Distributed Resource Management Application API Version 2 (DRMAA) - Errata
Editor - document #38: Distributed Resource Management Application API Version 2 (DRMAA) - Errata
entry.content: GFSG need to decide whether the an new GFD number has to be created for this version. Probably not since there is no implementation based of GFD-R-P.194 as Andre and Peter point out.

entry.title: Editor - document #38: Distributed Resource Management Application API Version 2 (DRMAA) - Errata
entry.content: This is headed for Standards Council review (gbn)

update IPR statement

entry.content: I think it's fine to replace #194 with this new version. I'll confirm via the standards council. Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #38: Distributed Resource Management Application API Version 2 (DRMAA) - Errata
entry.content:
• Status changed from final review to to be published
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Andre,

Would you please replace the published #194 with this new version*? Then, I can make an announcement to the OGF community. Thanks, Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #38: Distributed Resource Management Application API Version 2 (DRMAA) - Errata
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to published
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

Greg,

the GFD is replaced, feel free to announce and to close this ticket.

Thanks, Andre.
